content: गृहं [गृह्यते धर्माचरणाय, ग्रह् गेहार्थे क <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A house, dwelling, habitation, mansion; न गृहं गृहमित्याहुर्गृहिणी गृहमुच्यते <ls>Pt. 4. 81</ls>, <ls n="Pt.">5. 15</ls>; पश्य वानरमूर्खेण सुगृही निर्गृहीकृता <ls>Pt. 1. 390.</ls> {@--2@} A wife; (the first quotation in {@--1@} is sometimes erroneously cited as an illustration). {@--3@} The life of a householder; न हि सति कुलधुर्ये सूर्यवंश्या गृहाय <ls>R. 7. 71</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 10</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 28.</ls> {@--4@} A sign of the zodiac. {@--5@} A name or appellation. --हाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) {@--1@} A house, dwelling; इमे नो गृहाः <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; स्फटिकोपलविग्रहा गृहाः शशभृद्भित्तनिरंकभित्तयः <ls>N. 2. 74</ls>; तत्रागारं धनपतिगृहानुत्तरेणास्मदीयं <ls>Me. 75.</ls> {@--2@} A wife. {@--3@} The inhabitants of a house, family. --हः <ab>Ved.</ab> An assistant, or servant. In <ab>comp.</ab> <ab>oft.</ab> rendered by ‘domestic,’ ‘household’ or ‘tame’; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} °कपोतः ‘a tame pigeon’; °कार्याणि-कर्माणि ‘household duties’; °शकुंतिका ‘tame bird’ <ls>U. 1. 45</ls> &c.
